document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2020-02
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, CALI FORNI!\ MODIFYING AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE CHAPTER 5.10 COMMERCIAL CANNABIS LICENSE TO CLARIFY LIMITS ON THE NUMBER OF ALLOWABLE COMMERCIAL CANNABIS BUSINESSES IN THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON
